import{useState,createRef,useEffect}from"react";import axios from'axios';import"./Stats.css";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Funnel=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;// Collapse QR_VISITS + DIRECT_VISITS into one combined row
